fields.description: Each pokemon has a type, this determines weakness/resistance to attacks
Some pokemon are dual type and have 2
sum of all stats that come after this, a general guide to how strong a pokemon is
hit points, or health, defines how much damage a pokemon can withstand before fainting
the base modifier for normal attacks (eg. Scratch, Punch)
the base damage resistance against normal attacks
special attack, the base modifier for special attacks (e.g. fire blast, bubble beam)
the base damage resistance against special attacks
determines which pokemon attacks first each round
Which generation the Pokemon is from
Whether or not the Pokemon is legendary

card.description: This data set includes 721 Pokemon, including their number, name, first and second type, and basic stats: HP, Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed.
